resources.string: Please put your finger into the sensor.
Device connection failed, Please make sure the power is turned on.
Low battery! Please charging before measure.
The finger temperature is too low, which may affect the measure results.
The ambient temperature is too high, which may affect the measure results.
The ambient is too dry, which may affect the measure results.
The finger temperature is too low, which may affect the measure results.
The finger temperature is too high, which may affect the measure results.
Data collection error! Please reinsert your finger.
Finger sensing error may result in incorrect data collection.
Engage in stress-relieving activities to relax.
Health Diet, According to the following order and amount, 2 high fiber vegetables, 2 protein, 1 carbohydrate
2 hours after a meal \nFood intake: moderate
2 hours after a meal \nFood intake: large
Please complete the operation within the specified time
Recommended ambient temperature 20 ℃ -27 ℃ Suitable finger temperature 29 ℃ -35 ℃
The device is being initialized, please do n’t put your fingers in!
The device has been restarted, try again
Please press and hold the power button of the device for 2 seconds, the blue light on the right side will light up for normal boot.
Confirm the power on Next step
Init failed, please restart the device
Measurement error, please click Cancel to re-measure
Please restart the device and measure again.

1. Please confirm that the device is turned on normally \n2. Please confirm that the system [Bluetooth] is turned on or restart the system Bluetooth \n3. Please confirm that the system [Location Information] feature is turned on
The connection failed, please make sure the device switch is turned on
No network, please open the network
Device connection failed, please make sure the power is on
